content: बकुलः {@--1@} A kind of tree, Mimusops Elengi, (said according to the convention of poets to put forth blossoms when sprinkled by young women with mouthfuls of wine); कांक्षत्यन्यो (केसरः or बकुलः) वदनमदिरां दोहदच्छद्मनाऽस्याः <ls>Me. 78</ls>; बकुलः सीधुगंडूषसेकात् ( विकसति); (for similar conventions about other trees see the quotation under अशोक). {@--2@} A kind of drug. --लं The fragrant flower of this tree; <ls>Bv. 1. 54.</ls>
